button.info: Clickable element that can aid with site navigation. Also uses hover effects.

button.outline.info: Outlined version of a button but with a transparent fill colour.

button.secondary.info: Button with a secondary colour scheme.

button.bad.info: Button with a colour scheme to represent an action with consequence.

div.shade-light.info: Div with background colour of a light shade.

section.shade-light.info: Section with background colour of a light shade.

i[symbol].info: Allows icon to be read by a screen reader.

.center.info: Centre text and elements. Note the American spelling.

input.info: Element that can gather input from the user.
